Omg such a good game - the humour and puzzle solving are both so different from any other game I've played to date. This is one of my favourite games of all time.

Portal is the first Steam game I have ever bought, and it is amazing, especially considering its relatively low price. I have never played a puzzle game like this before. Using the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device ("portal gun"), you fire portals at the walls, ceiling, and floor to solve various puzzles, which start out easy but quickly become more complex. I enjoyed this game very the first time I played it, and I have liked it enough to play it 35 more times through speedrunning! (I am not very good at speedrunning it, but it is still a lot of fun to be able to complete it without glitches in 34.5 minutes.) Overall, this game is amazing and is one of the best puzzle games I have ever played.

By now everybody knows portal. 
It's a nice little puzzle game with the special feature of a portal gun. 
The game is absolutely great. 
If you own a PC and have Steam installed you should own Portal, or it's sequel. 

Rating 
Gameplay 4/5 - Nearly perfect, some minor annoyances 
Level Design 5/5 - Perfect for this game 
Soundtrack 4/5 - Pretty great 
Story 2/5 - Lacking 
Graphics 4/5 - The art style fits the game 
Length 2/5 - Very short 
Replay Value 4/5 - Much additional content to the main story 
Enjoyment 5/5 - It was absolutely great
Portal is a really great game. It's a bit short, but still very much worth it. The gameplay is fun, but the experience as a whole goes beyond that‚Ä¶
